title: Chris Brown Sued for Millions After Dog Attacks Housekeeper
description:
While Chris Brown has enjoyed a lot of commercial success, with some even referring to him as the “King of R&B”, he’s had many run-ins with the law. From his assault on Rihanna back in 2009, to fighting with Frank Ocean and fans trying to take pictures with him, Chris has been charged with assault and battery many times over. However, his latest lawsuit comes from his housekeepers, one of whom was viciously attacked and mauled by Chris’ dog Hades. Tune in to hear the Legally Judgy co-hosts break down Chris’ legal issues.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/legallyjudgy
LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/legallyjudgy
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
